Remote Work Visa

Argentina Digital Nomad Visa

Work remotely from Argentina for up to 180 days. Complete guide to requirements, application, and living as a digital nomad in Buenos Aires.

180 days validity
~$100-150 fee
2-4 week processing
180
Days Valid
$100-150
Application Fee
2-4
Weeks Processing
100%
Online Application

Requirements

Remote Work Proof

Employment contract or proof of self-employment with clients outside Argentina

Minimum Income

Proof of stable monthly income (approximately $1,500-2,500 USD recommended)

Accommodation

Proof of accommodation in Argentina (rental agreement or hotel booking)

Health Insurance

Valid health insurance covering your stay in Argentina

Application Process

1

Gather Documents

Collect passport, proof of remote work, income statements, health insurance, and accommodation proof.

2

Complete Online Application

Fill out the application form on the Argentine immigration website (migraciones.gov.ar).

3

Pay the Fee

Pay the visa application fee (approximately $100-150 USD, subject to change).

4

Submit & Wait

Submit your application and wait for approval (typically 2-4 weeks).

5

Enter Argentina

Once approved, enter Argentina within the validity period and complete any remaining registration.

Document Checklist

  • Valid passport (minimum 6 months validity)
  • Passport-sized photos (check current requirements)
  • Proof of remote employment or self-employment
  • Bank statements showing stable income
  • Health insurance policy valid in Argentina
  • Proof of accommodation (rental contract or hotel reservation)
  • Criminal background check from home country
  • Completed application form
  • Payment receipt for visa fee

Frequently Asked Questions

Important Notice

Visa requirements and fees change frequently. Always verify current requirements on the official Argentine Immigration website or consult with a qualified immigration attorney before applying. This guide is for informational purposes only.
